title: Turkey - Credit Rating
description: Standard & Poor's credit rating for Turkey stands at B with stable outlook. Moody's credit rating for Turkey was last set at B3 with stable outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Turkey was last reported at B with negative outlook. DBRS's credit rating for Turkey is BB (high) with negative outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Turkey thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Turkey as reported by major credit rating agencies.
